channel.title: Need to add teleports, but how?
channel.description:
i am not very good at coding, so i would need a little help here ( plase be specific if you answer :confused: )
i have two problems: the first is to add teleports to tele arround in my server ( especially to bosses ) the second problm is to add / change drop rate from npc's
note: ive seen the two vids at youtub for adding teleports, but one won't work and the other is [u]very[/u] confusing by the way, it's a 317 server :)
[b]thanks in advance[/b] :) :D

item.title: Need to add teleports, but how?
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

[quote=“im in a server, post:13, topic:399694”]do i have to have a autorestarter to make the “updates” complete?

the server doesn’t have a autorestarter, so is it possible to steal it from another DL?[/quote]

No. Just shut down the server for a minuet and compile.

Read full topic

item.source: Need to add teleports, but how?

item.title: Need to add teleports, but how?
item.dc:creator: @zattion zattion
item.description:
@zattion wrote:

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("boss")) { c.getPA().spellTeleport(x, y, 0); }

if (playerCommand.startsWith("tele") && c.playerRights >= 2) { String[] arg = playerCommand.split(" "); if (arg.length > 3) c.getPA().movePlayer(Integer.parseInt(arg[1]),Integer.parseInt(arg[2]),Integer.parseInt(arg[3])); else if (arg.length == 3) c.getPA().movePlayer(Integer.parseInt(arg[1]),Integer.parseInt(arg[2]),c.heightLevel); }
use it like this ::tele x y

Read full topic

item.title: Need to add teleports, but how?
item.dc:creator: @crazyfazespy crazyfazespy
item.description:
@crazyfazespy wrote:

its npcdrops.tsm for drops

you should see samthing like that

king black dragon
50:15 555:100
4151:1
note: items i added is not true kbd drops lol just for example
now first line is non rare items 50:15 it is npc and drop rate
line 2 is rare items u can make line 3 so that item gonan be more rare etc

for more info search for pi drop im sure samwhere saw tut with explaining pi npc drops system

item.source: Need to add teleports, but how?

item.title: Need to add teleports, but how?
item.dc:creator: @baddy351 baddy351
item.description:
@baddy351 wrote:

To make a normal command, in delta, its

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("Tele location")) { \\ Also you might need "else if" instead of "if" teleportToX = X Pos ; teleportToY = Y pos; sendMessage("You Teleport wherever."); }
in mage book it would be in: clickingmost.java or clickingbuttons.java, and to find it you would click the teleport, then in your run.bat (the actually part that is open fro you SERVER) it would say eg. case 6142, then look in either clickingmost or clickingbuttons.java, search for the case, and change the coords to your liking :d

Read full topic

i think that maybe commands would be good, but spellbook is ok
